location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Captain Robert Taylor, Assistant in Charge at Bussora [Basra] to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that a box packet for the Governor of Bombay is being conveyed to Bushire by the HC Cruizer Psyche. It requests that the Resident finds some other eligible, but speedy means of forwarding the packet to Bombay; it is explained that Mr Taylor would like the Psycheto return to Bussora [Basra] as quickly as possible.
